heroFirstPhrase: I'm Ibrahim Yusuf, an independent software developer from Syria
heroSecondPhrase: Explore my projects, skills, and experience in web, front end, and full stack development.
experience: Self Employed, Freelance Web Developer, Designed and developed responsive, visually appealing, client-approved web applications and front-end designs, collaborating with UI/UX designers to implement designs into front end code, improving user experience and engagement. Built productivity, social, e-commerce and customized web applications using React, MERN stack, CSS, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, Sass, Node.js, Express.js, TypeScript and MongoDB, ensuring scalability and performance, and provided innovative web solutions.
